content:
Forge deletes element/@id on certain elementdefinitions (the ones with slices it seems). Before save:

    <element id="Address.line.extension">
        <path value="Address.line.extension"/>
        <slicing>
            <discriminator value="url"/>
            <rules value="openAtEnd"/>
        </slicing>
    </element>

After save:

    <element>
        <path value="Address.line.extension"/>
        <slicing>
            <discriminator value="url"/>
            <rules value="openAtEnd"/>
        </slicing>
    </element>

Known? @Michel Rutten
